data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Palanivel, S., Manickavasagam, S., Triapitsyn, S. V. (2015): Stephanocampta Mathot (Hymenoptera: Mymaridae): descriptions of two new species and the female of S. indica Anwar & Zeya from India and a key to world taxa. Zootaxa 4012 (3): 479-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.3.4
